item.title: Netlify CMS up and working...
item.description: OK, so I got Netlify CMS and automated publishing to the GitHub Pages repository by means of Travis CI set up. The only missing link now is the custom github oauth token provider using serverless so the content can be edited from the github site rather than having to use Netlify directly.
